Falooda vermicelli soaked ½ cup
 Milk 2 cups
 Readymade kulfi as required
 Almonds 1 tablespo for garnishing
 Cashewnuts 1 tablespo for garnishing
 Pistachios 1 tablespo for garnishing
 Castor sugar (caster sugar) ¾ cup
 Subza soaked 8 tablespoons
 Cherries candied as required
 Rose syrup 8 teaspoons
 Raisins for garnishing

To make the rabri, heat milk in a non-stick pan till it thickens. Add almonds, cashewnuts, pistachios and castor sugar, mix well and cook till the mixture reduces to half. Remove from heat and refrigerate to chill. Drain and place a portion of the falooda in individual glass mugs. Add 2 tablespoons subza, top with some kulfi cubes and cherries. Pour some prepared rabri, drizzle 2 teaspoons rose syrup. Garnish with almonds, pistachios, cashewnuts, raisins, kulfi piece and a cherry and serve immediately.
